title: MIA pings
body: 'Enemy missing' pings should have a voice that says '___ mia' depending on which lane the ping came from. Like in Dota2, they have this and it always has my attention when someone pings.

replies.body: This would be fantastic, I usually ping 3-4 times to let people know my mid lane is missing, followed by a warning of where I think they're going. I still get so many people saying "wtf call MIAS" so I feel this would really help!
